page.title: 06THE A340 - PANGBOURNE ROAD
page.content: The A340 is the main north-south access road in the area. It provides people in villages like Pangbourne with quick and easy access to the M4 and Reading. 295 vehicles went onto the A340 from the roundabout. 195 had come from the Theale by-pass, 10 from Wigmore Lane, 68 from the A4(Thatcham), 2 from the A4(Theale) and 20 had gone once round the roundabout. 245 had come from the Theale by-pass, 9 from Wigmore Lane, 73 from the A4(Thatcham), 24 from the A4(Theale) and 20 had gone once round the roundabout. There is no obvious reason why so many cars should go once round the roundabout, unless the drivers had missed the ill-signposted road to Bradfield.
